description:
Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at £4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

Live Translator - AI Translate: The Ultimate AI Translator Keyboard for TikTok, Instagram, X, Discord, RED, WhatsApp, Facebook, and all your favorite apps!

Tired of machine translations that turn your witty comments into robotic text? Live Translator - AI Translate is your free multilingual assistant powered by advanced AI that actually understands internet culture and slang across languages!


Why Live Translator - AI Translate is Revolutionary:

• Instant translation that captures vibes, not just words
• Real-time interpretation of internet slang and trending expressions
• Preserves your tone, humor, and personality in every language
• Makes your content resonate with international and bilingual audiences


What Sets Our Translation App Apart:

• AI-powered keyboard with cutting-edge language models trained on social media
• Smart dictionary that understands context and cultural nuances
• Translates the untranslatable - from trending slang to viral expressions
• Authentic communication in English, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Spanish and more


Perfect for:

• Content creators wanting their voice to shine in global communication
• Social media users seeking accurate translations beyond basic text
• Travelers needing instant language interpretation
• International students and professionals messaging across language barriers
• Anyone wanting to learn expressions in foreign languages


Real-World Translation Examples:

Traditional Translator: "This is fire" → "This is burning"
Live Translator - AI Translate: "This is fire" → "C'est incroyable!" (French) / "¡Esto está que arde!" (Spanish)


Ready for seamless multilingual messaging? Download our free translator keyboard now and experience the future of global social media communication!


Join thousands of bilingual speakers and content creators who've discovered the secret to authentic international engagement. Don't let language barriers hold your conversation back - let Live Translator - AI Translate help your voice be heard in any language!


Key Features:

• Free real-time text and voice translator
• AI-powered keyboard integration for all apps
• Instant voice-to-text translation
• Support for English, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Spanish, and more languages
• Works across all messaging and social media platforms
• Speech recognition for natural conversation
• Dictionary and language learning tools included
• Native-quality translations of slang and expressions


Privacy and Security:

iOS requires all third-party keyboard apps to be granted full access in settings before use. While this is a system requirement, our translation app never collects personal information without your explicit permission.


Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula 
Privacy Policy: https://redbrid-7be14.web.app/policy.html

Voice translation was never so easy! Travel around the world and easily communicate in any country – Voice Translator will instantly pronounce translated phrases on-the-fly! Can’t read the menu items in a fancy foreign restaurant? Those days are history now with instant camera translation!

Communicate freely at the airport, hotel, gas station, supermarket or any other place. Read street signs in a foreign country, translate manuals of your overseas purchases or the text of any picture you already have in your phone. Just put your personal interpreter into a pocket and use it for your all translating needs!

Voice Translator is an essential learning tool for kids and adults – learn new phrases and listen to the correct pronunciation.

Start using Voice Translator now and forget about looking for the correct phrase in the dictionary – say any phrase and your interpreter will pronounce the translation out loud!

Features:
– Immediate translation of real-time conversations
– Use your camera for instant text translation
– Translate texts from your photos and pics
– Translate as you type in any of your favorite messaging apps
– Extended offline phrasebook
– Language detection for text-to-text mode
– 100+ languages working in speech-to-speech and text-to-text modes
– You can either speak or type to translate your text
– Smart text-to-text mode
– Speed up your text input with typing hints
– Convert text from languages with non-Latin alphabet
– Copy, paste and share translations in a single tap
– Intuitive dialogue conversation interface
– Speak the translated phrase out loud
– Control the speed of voice
– Male and female voices available
– Human-to-Pet and Pet-to-Human modes (for entertainment purposes only). Translate your pet’s meow or woof into your language.

Why use multiple apps when you can track all your TCGs in one place? Most collectors collect multiple TCGs. Whether you are a Pokemon collector, Magic collector, YuGiOh collector, MetaZoo collector, or even a Funko collector, this app is for you!



Collectr is a next-generation portfolio manager. We allow you to manage, track and value all your raw, graded and sealed cards in the palm of your hand. It’s never been easier to view your TCG collections as a portfolio. 



Leverage our real-time database of 200,000+ products to instantly value your products.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES THAT REQUIRE IN-APP PURCHASE

Download our app today and start managing your collection in the most advanced and efficient way possible!

PlantAI is the most up-to-date AI plant care assistant using cutting-edge technology. The app helps you to get answers to your plant-related queries directly, but the usage isn't limited to that. You can identify any unknown plant species, diagnose your plant, and get professional plant care guides.

With PlantAI, you will be able to satisfy your plant curiosity anywhere anytime within seconds. You will get detailed plant information like its name, characteristics, and toxicity. Moreover, this app offers you hands-on planting and growing tips like water, fertilize, mist, clean, and repot.

Try the most trending AI plant chatbot to explore a bigger world of plants today!

Key features:
Get instant replies to any plant questions
Plant identification with high accuracy
Auto-diagnose plant health problems and get corresponding solutions
Expert-level plant care tips to help your greenery grow better
Give likes to the conversation

Translate text, voice, and photos in 320 different languages. Featuring a keyboard translator and live voice translator.

Whether you need to translate for travel, work, study, or everyday conversation, Translate Now is your ultimate AI-powered language translator. Break language barriers instantly with Translate Now’s multilingual translation tools, making every interaction seamless.

Key Features

▶ Hands-Free Voice Translator for Real-Time Conversations
Effortlessly overcome language barriers with a real-time, hands-free voice translator. Simply speak into your device for instant two-way translation and enjoy multilingual conversations with ease.
▶ Photo Translator for Instant Translation
Translate menus, signs, and pictures instantly with your camera. Just snap a photo for a real-time translation—perfect for travel and navigating world languages.
▶ Keyboard Translator for Multilingual Chat
Type in your native language and send translations live in 60 different languages within any app for effortless messaging.
▶ AI Translator for Instant Text Translation
Translate text with AI-enhanced accuracy, phonetic support, and context-aware translation in 320+ languages.
▶ AR Live Translator for an Immersive Local Experience
Use your camera and augmented reality to translate live, making language learning and travel more intuitive.
▶ AI-Powered Dictionary & Grammar Assistant
Expand your vocabulary with contextual meanings and receive real-time grammar corrections for more precise translations.

Translate Now offers various AI Translation Models, Phrasebook, Watch App, Translation Extension, Offline Mode, Dark Mode, Siri Shortcuts, Interactive Widgets, and SharePlay.

Download Translate Now, your ultimate language translator! Experience the power of language translation at your fingertips. Text, speak, and translate effortlessly between French, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Italian, Arabic, German, Urdu, Thai, Korean, Portuguese, Punjabi, Polish, and more!

Introducing EveryScan — your ultimate mobile companion app that transforms your smartphone into an advanced visual encyclopedia. Harness the power of cutting-edge AI image recognition to swiftly identify and gain insights on the world around you, directly from your mobile device.

Animal Identification
Curious about "what animal is this"? Use EveryScan to instantly identify animals, including specific breeds and characteristics. From cat breed recognizers to dog breed identifiers, this mobile app is your essential tool for comprehensive animal recognition.

Insect and Reptile Recognition
Dive into the insect world with our bug identifier. Capture images of caterpillars, spiders, and snakes using your mobile device, and learn about their characteristics and safety through our snake identifier, addressing questions like "what kind of snake is this?"

Mushroom and Plant Insights
Simply snap a picture to identify plants and fungi safely with your phone. Our app's flower and mushroom identifiers provide detailed care tips and safety information, directly enhancing your botanical knowledge.

Coin and Jewelry Examination
Easily scan coins and jewelry with your mobile to determine their value and history, answering queries like "how much are my coins worth?" Our coin scanner feature helps you check your coins' worth and origins swiftly.

Culinary Exploration
Identify food items, dishes, and recipes while accessing nutritional details right from your mobile device. Recognize dishes and their caloric content with ease, enhancing your culinary knowledge.

AI-Powered Features
- Accurate image recognition tailored for mobile use
- Instant object detection via your smartphone
- Universal object identifier: insect identifier, dog breed identifier, flower identifier, spider, snake identifier, etc.
- Real-time searching and scanning through your mobile
- Comprehensive data on everything from animals to everyday items
- Save and mark favorites for easy mobile access

Effortless Exploration
Skip search engines—just take a picture and identify items instantly using your phone. EveryScan integrates seamlessly with your mobile, offering an all-in-one picture identifier and AI image search capability. Unlock the secrets around you with curiosity and confidence. Download EveryScan today, and discover a world of knowledge at your fingertips.

Terms of Use: http://aiscanner.co/tou

description:
Break Language Barriers Instantly with AI Translator – Your Live, Real-Time Translation Companion


Speak, scan, and translate now—anytime, anywhere—with Translate AI, the ultimate AI translator for everyday communication, travel, business, and learning. Whether you’re navigating a new country, chatting with friends abroad, or closing international deals, this powerful live translator is designed to help you understand and be understood.
With cutting-edge AI for translation, Translate AI offers real-time voice and audio translator tools, camera-based AI image translation, text translation, and an offline phrasebook—all in one sleek app. Say goodbye to confusion and hello to seamless, global conversations.

Key Features:

Real-Time Voice & Audio Translator
Experience fluent, two-way communication with our live voice translator. Speak naturally and get instant results with our AI auto translate engine. Perfect for business, travel, and everyday use.

AI Camera & Photo Translator

Point your camera at any text—menus, signs, labels—and Translate AI will detect and translate it instantly. Use our AI image translation technology to see the world through your language.

AI Text Translator

Type or paste text to receive fast, accurate translations. From single words to full sentences, our ai translator engine ensures clarity every time.
Translate Audio with Ease
The built-in audio translator makes spoken communication fast and fluid. Great for meetings, voice memos, or casual conversation.
Supports Over 100 Languages
From English, Spanish, and French to Chinese, Japanese, Turkish, and more, Translate AI gives you access to over 100 supported languages.
Offline Phrasebook
 Save key phrases and access them even without the internet. Your must-have tool for travelers and emergencies.
Smarter Translations, Thanks to AI
 Our app uses advanced AI quick translate technology that adapts to your tone and context. It’s like having an intelligent interpreter in your pocket.

Why Choose Translate AI?

Fast and intuitive ai translator for speech, text, and images

Welcome to the world of simplified crafting: YarnPal is the app that brings your knitting and crochet skills to life in no time. Simply snap a photo, follow step-by-step instructions, and create personalised projects—anytime, anywhere.

YarnPal is your daily companion for knitting and crochet, giving you easy access to tutorials, patterns, and design inspiration. Try it now with our free trial and unlock a world of stitches, motifs, and creative possibilities—perfect for both beginners and experienced makers!

What Can YarnPal Do?
1. Snap a Photo, Learn a Stitch
Seen a stitch you love? Take a photo, and YarnPal will tell you its name and show you how to do it. Picking up new stitches is quick and easy!
2. Step-by-Step Pattern Help
Stuck on a pattern? Upload it to YarnPal. The app will break it down for you and help you keep track of your place as you work through each row. You can even adjust the pace to suit your needs.
3. Creative AI Tools
Get Pattern Ideas: Lacking inspiration? Let YarnPal’s AI suggest new patterns for scarves, shawls, and other creative projects.
Fix Mistakes: Made an error? YarnPal can spot and help you fix it.
Understand Charts and Symbols: Struggling with pattern charts? YarnPal explains the symbols so you can follow along with confidence.
4. Ask the AI Coach
Have a question about knitting or crochet? Ask the AI Coach anything! From basic stitches to advanced techniques, get instant answers and helpful advice.
5. Personalise Your Projects
Want to make something unique? Adjust sizes, styles, and patterns to match your ideas. YarnPal helps you create truly one-of-a-kind pieces.

Who Is YarnPal For?
1. Beginners
New to knitting or crochet? YarnPal makes learning simple, with clear steps and helpful tips to get you started with confidence.
2. Hobbyists
Already enjoy knitting or crochet? Use YarnPal to try out new tools, tackle tricky patterns, and customise your projects. Take your craft to the next level!
3. Experts
Even for advanced crafters, YarnPal saves you time and sparks fresh ideas. Design better patterns, fix issues efficiently, and stay motivated.

Why Use YarnPal?
With YarnPal, crafting is:
Easy: Learn stitches and patterns stress-free.
Fun: Get creative and try something new.
Organised: Easily keep track of projects and progress.

Join the YarnPal Community
Connect with knitters and crocheters from around the world to share ideas, showcase your work, and get inspired. With YarnPal, you’ll never craft alone.

Start Your YarnPal Journey Today!
Download YarnPal now and see what you can create. Whether it’s your first simple scarf or an intricate piece of your own design, YarnPal will guide you every step of the way. Let’s make something amazing together!

description:
Your face is a time machine with EDNA. Our advanced technology generates a stunning photo of your ancestors and reveals your true origin story. See who you really are. All from just one selfie.

Forget boring family trees that end in names on a chart. We offer a tangible connection. Our technology renders a lifelike, era-authentic portrait of ancestors you’ve never met, capturing a plausible likeness with a strangely familiar face. It’s a jaw-dropping, shareable moment of connection when you see your own eyes, your smile, looking back at you from another time. This is the family photograph that was never taken.

But the portrait is just the beginning. It’s your entry point into a complete Ancestral Report, a deep dive into the elements that define your heritage.

First, discover your true origins with a detailed, percentage-based breakdown of your nationality. Go beyond continents to see the specific blend of cultures that make up your unique identity, revealing connections you never knew existed. Then, we reveal their story. Learn about the specific city your ancestors likely called home, the authentic craft they dedicated their lives to, and even the historical diet that fueled their world.

Your origin story doesn't just end in the past—it echoes in your present. The resilience of a frontiersman, the precision of an artisan, the creativity of a storyteller; these are more than historical facts, they are potential traits within you. We connect your heritage to your life today, offering unique insights for modern careers and lifestyles that may align with these ancestral strengths. It’s a powerful new way to understand your own passions and potential.

Join a growing community of people discovering themselves in a completely new way. The stories and portraits generated by EDNA are sparking conversations, connecting families, and helping people see their own identity in a richer, deeper light. It's a unique experience everyone is talking about.

This isn’t a guess. Our analysis is powered by a vast database of real historical records, cultural trends, and geographic data. This robust framework allows us to create a narrative that feels both magical and deeply plausible. We are committed to your privacy; your photo and personal data are always secure and are never shared.

Curious about your family history? Add branches to your family tree with FamilySearch Tree, the world’s largest online family tree. FamilySearch Tree makes it easy and convenient to discover and document your own branches of the world’s family tree while preserving family memories, such as photos, written stories, and audio recordings.

Harness the power of a worldwide, crowd-sourced pedigree to discover your family story. As you add information, FamilySearch will start searching for your family members while looking at historical records like birth and death certificates. Share information that others might not know, and add sources to confirm correct information. Update information and records easily so that everyone has accurate information.

Browse your family tree branches, and see portraits of relatives you’ve never seen before. Discover facts, documents, stories, photos, and recordings about your ancestors. Easily add new life details, photos, stories, and audio recordings for your relatives.

Find and share meaningful, heart-turning family stories that will make an impact on your life and the lives of your loved ones.

Genealogy at Your Fingertips
Family history has never been easier to track and build.
Build your family tree by finding or adding family members directly through the app.
Once you add a deceased relative to the family tree, FamilySearch will try to connect you to any information it has about that person in its database.
Discover new family members and descendants in the community tree.
Explore your heritage in maps that show where the key events of your ancestors’ lives took place.

Ancestors, Relatives, and Family
Find your ancestors in the billions of records on FamilySearch.org to learn more details of your family story.
Discover facts, documents, stories, photos, and recordings about your ancestors.
Easily add new life details, photos, stories, and audio recordings for your relatives.
See which ancestors FamilySearch has already found in historical records, and get ideas for what to do next.
Discovering your own family history potentially helps others in their search.
Explore your heritage in maps that show where the key events of your ancestors’ lives took place.

Collaborate with Others
Connect with other family members, and share information that others might not know.
View, add, and edit information about your ancestors. 
Enhance your tree by adding photos, stories, and documents.
Add sources to confirm correct information.
Communicate and collaborate with other FamilySearch users from within the app with in-app messaging.
Connect with family near and far. You may find a relative who has visited the same graves, asked the same questions about—and even learned to love or admire—the same ancestors. 

Watch your family tree grow. Discover family, learn your family history, and help map the family tree for mankind with FamilySearch Tree. 

NOTE: Content you provide for deceased individuals will be publicly available. See our privacy policy for more details.

Mate is an incredibly powerful translator app which is deeply integrated with iOS. It lets you easily translate words, texts and speech anywhere on your iPhone or iPad. It works both online and offline, as well as available in dark and light mode. Mate will have your back with 103 languages.

Mate is equally helpful if you're mastering a new language, want to take down a language barrier when going abroad, or just occasionally need to translate a web page, email, message, etc.

Full list of supported languages: 
https://www.matetranslate.com/languages

Mate has some simple yet powerful iOS extensions which will save you a lot of time:

- Safari Extension. Browse the web without even noticing that there are foreign languages. Mate will translate websites before you even see them.

- Share Extension. Translate in Mail, Notes, PDFs by highlighting text, choosing Share and then Mate from Share Menu.

- iMessage App. Write messages in your language, Mate will translate them on the fly and send in the recipient's language. Or vice versa.

- Widget. Translate clipboard contents by long-pressing Mate's icon on home screen or from the Search screen.

We also supercharged Mate with some features language enthusiasts will totally love:

- Genders for nouns. Supports French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Swedish, and Dutch.

- Phonetic transcription and transliteration for both original and translation.

- Speak out.

- Phrasebook. It's an easy way to store vocabulary you want to learn. You can save words to Phrasebook directly or shuffle your existing translations to it.

If you're always on the go, we have something for you, too:

- Speech Translator.

- Mate Account. Mate has a powerful Mac app and extensions for all major browsers. Using Mate Account you can keep translation history and Phrasebook synchronized on all devices.

Mate is available for all of your devices:
https://matetranslate.com/download

We post frequent updates on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/MateTranslate
